summary: This page is a German early-math worksheet titled 'Bilder suchen und legen' focused on basic geometry. It features a color-by-shape mosaic coloring activity, a counting task to identify squares, rectangles, triangles, and circles, and a construction exercise using 12 sticks to form various shapes. There are additional pattern and replication tasks at the bottom of the page. The exercises aim to help young learners recognize geometric shapes and develop early geometry and counting skills.
title: Geometric Shapes Practice
creator: Unknown publisher

summary: A child's drawing showing two people standing in front of a mountain landscape. Across the sky is colorful, blocky handwriting that reads 'NÄCHSTES MAL KOMME ICH MIT' (Next time I will come with). The figures wear bright blue and red clothing, with green pants and red shoes, set against gray, jagged mountains. The scene conveys a hopeful message of joining or accompanying someone on a future trip.
title: Nächstes Mal Komme Ich
creator: Child artist (unknown)

summary: A child’s drawing shows two people in bright clothing standing before a jagged mountain range. Across the mountains is a colorful German message reading 'Nächstes Mal Komm Ich Mit' (Next time I come with). In the bottom right, a separate white card displays the date 02.08.2014 in red ink. The scene appears playful and spontaneous, created with crayons and simple shapes.
title: Next Time I Come
creator: Unknown child

summary: An invoice from Beispiel Firma GmbH to Alice Müller. It carries the invoice number RE-2013-12345 with date 11.05.2023. The document lists three items: Gabeln (15 pieces at 10 € each), Messer (10 pieces at 5 € each), and Löffel (3 pieces at 25 € each). Net amount is 275.00 €, plus 19% VAT (52.25 €), totaling 327.25 €. The payment is requested by 25.05.2015 using the reference RE-2013-12345.
title: Rechnung Beispiel Firma GmbH
creator: Beispiel Firma GmbH

summary: BeispielFirma GmbH invoices Alice Müller for cutlery items (Gabeln, Messer, Löffel). title: BeispielFirma Rechnung 2023
creator: BeispielFirma GmbH
